channel.title: Java on Mohamed Abdullah
channel.description: Recent content in Java on Mohamed Abdullah

item.title: Why SDKMAN?
item.description:
If you’ve ever tried contributing to multiple open-source Java projects, you’ve probably run into this: Project A needs Java 8, Project B screams for Java 17, and Project C? It says, “Java 21 or I won’t even compile.”

At this point, you’ve got two options:

  1. Cry softly into your coffee mug, or
  2. Use SDKMAN!, the magical version manager for the JVM world.

Let’s go with option two. It’s less soggy.

item.title: Maven Tutorial 101
item.description: Ah, Apache Maven. The tool that promises to solve your build problems but can occasionally feel like a high school group project where everyone has their own idea of how things should be done. But fear not! Whether you’re new to Maven or just looking to freshen up your knowledge, this guide will help you navigate through the complexities of dependency management and build automation. And yes, we’ve got memes to make it fun.
